summary: POWER RACK AND PINION LEAKAGE OCCURRED AND RACK NEEDED TO BE REPLACED.  THE WARRANTY 3 YRS. OR 36,000 MI. HAD EXPIRED ACCORDING TO DEALER.  $800.00 AND 15 MONTHS LATER A "CLUNKING" NOISE IS COMING FROM THE STEERING WHEEL DURING PARKING MANEUVERS.  APPARENTLY, THEY ONLY WARRANTY THE PART FOR 12 MONTHS.   *JB
